column4: help... i have this line "wine CFFiles.exe /e <a_file>" wich runs without problems on my console... but when i try to to do it with a nautilus script: "wine CFFiles.exe /e $NAUTILUS_SCRIPT_SELECTED_FILE_PATHS", it doesn't work.... i tried this in the same script "gedit $NAUTILUS_SCRIPT_SELECTED_FILE_PATHS" and it works, so what is the problem??
